SourceProxy.name: CGNSReader
SourceProxy.label: CGNS Reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in CGNS format.
Documentation.long_help: Read files stored in CGNS format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The CGNS reader reads files stored in CGNS format. The default file extension is .cgns. The output of this reader is a multi-block dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the CGNS reader.

StringVectorProperty.name: BaseStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Bases
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the bases to be loaded from the dataset, if any.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of the point-centered arrays to read.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.label: Cell Arrays
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains a list of the cell-centered arrays to read.

IntVectorProperty.name: LoadBndPatch
IntVectorProperty.label: Load Boundary Elements (Unstructured Grid)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to take into account boundary elements in cgns zones If unchecked, the boundary elements are ignored. If checked, a "Patches" Multiblock node will appear under the zone node. It stores the boundaries' geometry while the original volume cells are put in a "Internal" node.

IntVectorProperty.name: DoublePrecisionMesh
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Double Precision Mesh
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to load mesh with double precision values or with floating values If unchecked, mesh coordinates are store on 32 bit so it has lower memory footprint. If checked, mesh coordinates are store on 64 bit so it has higher memory requirements. Changing this property may impact the loading performance since if the cgns file mesh precision and the wanted precision are different conversion will occur

IntVectorProperty.name: CreateEachSolutionAsBlock
IntVectorProperty.label: Each Solution As Block (Debug)
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle whether to load each Solution node under a zone separately. This is intended only for debug purpose

SourceProxy.name: CGNSSeriesReader
SourceProxy.label: CGNS Series Reader

Documentation.short_help: Read a dataset in CGNS format.
Documentation.long_help: Read binary files stored in CGNS format.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The CGNS reader reads binary files stored in CGNS format. The default file extension is .cgns. The output of this reader is a multi-block dataset. This reader also supports file series.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileNames
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: The list of files to be read by the reader. If more than 1 file is specified, the reader will switch to file series mode in which it will pretend that it can support time and provide 1 file per time step.
